alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 27 at 10:14PM PST until December 28 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter of a mile or less at times in dense fog. * WHERE...In Oregon, Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Lower Columbia Basin of Washington. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There may be localized pockets of freezing fog where temperatures are below freezing.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
